name: Pass On(,) Ghostie
description:
You are Ghostie, a recently-deceased spirit. Your final regret is tethering you to the mortal world and keeping you from moving on to the afterlife. Before you died...you forgot to delete your internet history. There's only one solution: possess a living body and return to your computer to finish the job.

In this irreverent puzzle-platformer, you must mercilessly sacrifice your host bodies and use their tombstones to progress. Can you overcome these challenges, and your guilt, to help Ghostie find peace?

This game started as my team's submission for Global Game Jam 2018, with the theme "Transmission".  After the Game Jam, Brian Patterson continued working on it and made a completed prototype.

Our Team

Brian Patterson -- Player Programmer / Artist 

Chris Budden -- Interaction Programmer 

Storm Tuchek -- Systems Programmer 

Matthew Mannheimer -- Marketing Lead

GGJ 2018

See our game's original page here: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/pass-ghostie
